title.narrative: Teacher Effectiveness and Equitable Access for Children (TEACH) in Zimbabwe

description.narrative: Teacher Effectiveness and Equitable Access for Children (TEACH) in Zimbabwe aims to support 86,960 pre- and in-service teachers, and 6,800 school leaders over four years, concluding in October 2025. A network of 18 Professional Development Officers will be based throughout the country, working with Provincial and District Education Departments and Teacher Training Colleges to provide TPD in every province. Twice a term, ‘leaders of learning’ – representatives from school with the ability to guide their colleagues – will attend a cluster-based workshop where TEACH-TPD, in partnership with local education officials, will guide them through a course of professional development which they can repeat with teachers in their schools
